lead_paragraph: Authorities from a drug enforcement task force said the drugs, with an estimated street value of $14 million, had been molded to fit in axle casings and a drive shaft in a truck bed.
snippet: Authorities from a drug enforcement task force said the drugs, with an estimated street value of $14 million, had been molded to fit in axle casings and a drive shaft in a truck bed.

headline.main: 100 Pounds of Heroin Found in Truck in Queens
headline.print_headline: 100 Pounds of Heroin Found Hidden in a Truck in Queens

abstract: New York City authorities report discovery of 100 pounds of heroin, with estimated street value of $14 million, in pickup truck that was pulled over in Queens as part of drug task force stakeout.
